title: David Wain on Making the ‘Wet Hot American Summer’ Franchise (Ep. 177)
description:
Andy Greenwald sits down with ‘Wet Hot American Summer’ franchise director and cocreator David Wain to discuss creating and adapting his comedy film to a TV series for Netflix, what it’s like working with a multitude of famous people with busy schedules, and where the franchise goes from here.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
